name: Sea of Friends
description:
MMO sea exploration game

Controls:

  • Left click to fish -> left click to reel
  • Right click to move & right click to get in/out of boats
  • Tab - toggle streamer mode (hides usernames)

Goal of the game:

  • Explore

Asset Credits:
